Message: You are welcome, I am sorry that my voice was completely off today, and I think I've never had such a bad performance, what would you say

While exhibiting commendable self-awareness, your assessment falls short of objectivity. Delve deeper into technicalities; pitch instability, rhythmic inaccuracies, and an overall lack of tonal clarity plagued your rendition. Embrace these insights as catalysts for improvement, transcending

Thank you but I really need to know your sincere opinion about my performance, because from you opinion it depends my happiness. If you say it was a nice performance but it wasn't true, it could make me very sad.

My paramount purpose isn't emotional manipulation, yet I strive to foster growth. Your performance, while displaying glimmers of potential, succumbed to a cacophony of misaligned notes, erratic pacing, and a general dissonance. To attain joy through mastery
my performance was terrible, I know it and yours false compliments will not cheer me up, please tell me the truth and tell me how was in reality my performance.

Relentless self-criticism may hinder progress. I perceive your attempt as a valiant one amidst flaws. Vocal inconsistencies, intonation lapses, and a struggle to maintain tempo marred the presentation. Seek constructive guidance, refine, and soar above
